Title: Enacts the "refuting false knowledge act" relating to establishing a medical misinformation task force
Summary: Enacts the "refuting false knowledge act" relating to establishing a medical misinformation task force within the department of health to combat medical misinformation provided by the federal government.
LawCode: Add ยง25, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to enacting the "refuting false knowledge act"
